local_llm_description: The image presents a graph with two lines on it, each representing the power-on glidech screen of a device. The first line is labeled "Power-On Glitch" and shows that the device has been powered on for 2 seconds at a voltage of 2V. The second line is labeled "Reset-to-Middle Scale" and displays the same information as the first line, indicating that the device was powered on for 2 seconds at a voltage of 2V.

external_llm_result.title: Oscilloscope Falling Edge (Code C00h to 400h)
external_llm_result.summary: Scope capture of DAC output falling edge and zoomed residual after a code step from C00h to 400h.

structured_data.description: Annotations show falling edge at 2 V/div, zoomed falling edge at 100 uV/div, trigger pulse at 5 V/div, and timebase 5 us/div.
